title: Sync Creatives Async Response - Input Required
description: Structure of parts.data in webhook payloads for sync_creatives when status is 'input-required'. Used within A2A StreamResponse statusUpdate.message.parts[].data (DataPart data field). This status indicates that additional input or fixes are required before the creative sync can proceed (e.g., invalid format, missing assets, validation errors).

creative_ids.description: Array of creative IDs requiring input or fixes. Required for identifying which creatives need attention.

errors.description: Array of error objects explaining what input or fixes are needed

context.description: Application-level context echoed from the request. Opaque correlation data for internal tracking.

errors.message: Creative assets do not match the required format specifications. Video duration must be exactly 30 seconds, but provided video is 28 seconds.
errors.suggestion: Provide a video asset with duration_ms of 30000 (30 seconds) to match the format requirements
